main event: Witnesses in Lima, Ohio observed bright red and green objects moving from West to Southeast on the night of April 21, 1966.
interesting points: Two witnesses reported seeing five unidentified objects in the sky., The objects were described as bright red and green., The direction of the objects' movement was from West to Southwest., A request for report forms was made to gather more detailed witness accounts., The conclusion of the investigation was marked as insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: five bright red and green objects in the sky
witness description: Residents of Lima, Ohio, including a woman's husband who wrote a letter to Project Blue Book.
